item.title: Subdomain Enumeration:Build yourn own tool
item.description: Hello security enthusiasts welcome to yet another blog. In this blog, we will learn how to create a simple subdomain enumeration tool with python. Subdomain enumeration is a critical step in recon since understanding digital assets play a major role in every pentest activity. For the same, we have a various set of tools and techniques created by awesome people in the hacking community. Sublister, Amass, and the list goes on.
